Package controller

Class GrabController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.GrabController
  • public class GrabController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class control the action Grab and check if the player is allowed to do that

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      GrabController​(Match match, MoveController moveCtrl)
      This method is the constructor for the Grab controller

    • Constructor Detail

      • GrabController

        public GrabController​(Match match,
                      MoveController moveCtrl)
        This method is the constructor for the Grab controller
        Parameters:
        match - is the current match
        moveCtrl - is the Move controller (is helpful because before the Grab action you can move)

    • Method Detail

      • setMatch

        public void setMatch​(Match match)

      • grabAmmoCard

        public void grabAmmoCard()
                  throws WrongPositionException
        This method checks if the player can Grab an Ammo Card, and then grabs the ammo card
        Throws:
        WrongPositionException - if the position requested is not type NOSPAWN
        See Also:
        for the type of square

      • grabWeapon

        public void grabWeapon​(Weapon weapon,
                       int indexOfWeaponToSwap)
                throws WrongPositionException,
                       NotEnoughAmmoException,
                       NotAllowedCallException
        This method checks if the player can Grab Weapon, and then grabs the weapon
        Parameters:
        weapon - is the weapon to Grab
        indexOfWeaponToSwap - if the player has already 3 weapons he has to chose the index of the Weapon to leave
        Throws:
        WrongPositionException - if the position requested is not type SPAWN
        NotEnoughAmmoException - if the player has not enough ammo to grab the weapon
        NotAllowedCallException - if the weapon is not contained in the square
        See Also:
        for the type of square
